nodes.bodyText: Add static import for offset(). Improves readability. It's the same approach as with Joiners.*.

Maybe even?
private static final Offset tolerance = ...;
This cast doesn't make sense. Casting the "actual" argument to SimpleScore would make sense.
Wrong cast again. See also children of AbstractConstraintStreamTest.
Redundant cast. It seems this is done automatically by your IDE. Please check if you can avoid that.
as() needs to go before assertions, otherwise it's unreachable.
